name: Thread (Neonesque)
description:
In this puzzle game, you must figure out what each clue means through observation and experimentation, and use your knowledge to find the solution to each of the 51 levels. With seven rules to discover, there are many surprises in store!

Control with arrow keys or wasd, select menu options with spacebar or x, undo with z, reset with r, and return to level select with esc
